name: India Home Tips
overview:
India Home Tips (http://indiahometips.com) is a platform for help with home making, home improvement, remodeling houses, home repair, decorating, tips for buying appliances, other home repair products and tips for cars dedicated to India.

India Home Tips has various useful articles on the following topics which are regularly updated for use: Air Conditioners, Air Coolers and Fans Bathroon Fixtures and Plumbing Doors, Locks and Accessories Floors, Stairs and Carpeting Furniture, Bedding, Cabinets, Countertops and Storage General Home Improvement and Home Decor Heating Equipment Home Appliances and Lighting Home Building and Planning Kitchen Appliances & Fixtures Painting Tools, Material and Hardware Vaastu and Feng Shui Walls, Ceilings and Terrace Water Heaters, Filters and Softeners Windows, Skylights and Glazing

There are guides on shopping for home appliances and tips on maintenance of household items. There are separate sections for Health and Safety and also Cars.

A new section on Pets is coming up. Blog and Forums have been added to the http://www.indiahometips.com for interactivity. It also has a web directory of various appliances in India and also links to various website providing pricing and feature comparison. There are tools and calculators for various home functions available on the website.
